name: TheSelf-CareVortexPodcast
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Aloha! You’ve been guided here to remember that you are enough. Meet your purpose and reach your fullest potential through multi-sensorial self-care. Nurture all aspects of yourself - the physical, mental, emotional, energetic and spiritual. This is a safe and sacred space for transformation, personal growth, unconditional love, and radical transparency. Every Wednesday: Interview • Every Sunday: Meditation and Sound Journey • 1 weekly surprise episode! Much love, your host Melissa Kiss
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
